entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Window.Destroying event not fired when you swipe the app away on Android #20146
  • Windows scroll bar configure to be always visible and always expanded... #20145
  • Disabling a SwipeView disables the underlying items #20142
  • GoToAsync returns user to desired page but previous page's OnAppearing() is triggered #20141
  • Xcode 15+ VS 17.8.5 Can't get Simulators #20138
  • MainDisplayInfo reports page size instead of screen size in .net 8 #20137
  • iOS iPad Entry Control: Tab on an external keyboard does not move between UI Elements #20135
  • Breakpoints do not work when debugging configuration other than Debug #20132
  • MAUI Shell FlyoutHeader is not showing properly on iOS in landscape mode #20131
  • Label Truncation and MaxLines options do not work when combined #20128
  • [MAUI][.NET8] ‘Review’ module jumps repeatedly when editing recipe page. #20126

Closed

  • [Android] Legacy Gallery locking up on issue search when you search with a number #20143
  • Can only ignore iOS Safe Area when navigation bar is hidden #17022
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Bundling WASDK in Packaged application throws `TypeInitializationException` #19167
    .NET 8 SR2
  • How to handle AppWindow closing event before close window on MacOS? #20134
  • iOS - MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() doesn't work if Limited permission (Selected Photos) for Photo Gallery #14973
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Rework/rename/delete IMauiInitializeScopedService #19591
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Enable Scope Validation for dependency injection in .NET MAUI during development #11457
    .NET 8 SR2
  • CollectionView for WinUI flicker problem in 8.0.6 #20043
    .NET 8 SR2
  • .NET Maui todo list problem #20123

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Bump GitInfo to 3.3.3 #20136
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, testing-flakiness
  • Update LayoutExtensions.cs #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Don't remeasure TableView if specs are the same #20130
  • [Housekeeping] Enabling ignored tests #20129
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix 19647 #20127
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    community ✨

Merged

  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • Enable building WASDK Self-Contained packaged apps #20019
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [ci] Update System.Drawing.Common #20122
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [Windows] Adjust recycle check in ItemContentControl #20079
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • [.NET 9] Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #19996
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label, Under Consideration
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Optimize GetVisualTreeElementsWindowsInternal #19984
    community ✨
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
